headline: HSBC Trims Amgen (AMGN) Price Target, Maintains Buy Rating
summary: Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) is one of the high-margin pharma stocks to buy now. HSBC has lowered its price target on Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) from $385 to $357 while reiterating a Buy rating, as concerns mount over potential earnings pressure tied to proposed U.S. trade policies. The firm’s updated valuation reflects a more cautious outlook amid geopolitical uncertainty […]
